trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Greenville
There was one other sighting in Greenville on or around March 7th 2002
divs: Sighting Details I was helping to load a mobile home to go on shortvacation. I was lifting things to be put in top storage area when I noticed asaucer like object with a small cone tower. It was a bright bluish green color. it was making a slight circular pattern,tilted as if were going to left. I sawobject for approximately one to two seconds and it disappeared. It was in theearly morning hours on a clear day. Hard to distinguish exact size with noobjects in background.
